name: Warship (itch) (clara.lmao, Ari-bytes)
description:
" My presence in this galaxy is threatened, my child. Unbelievers are approaching the Monolith, seeking to destroy it. Should they succeed, my divine powers will fade and our people will be forever doomed.

Go to the Monolith. Defend it, my child, for as long as you can.

May your final worship be a glorious one."

Made for the AGES & SKILLS GameJam, theme "Worship" in March 2023, Skövde, Sweden.

CONTROLS

A to Fly Left
D to Fly Right
LMB or SPACE to Fire Lasers
RMB to activate Monolith Discharge

CREDITS

Ossia Sokolova, programmer
Simon Brander, programmer
Arine Längsjö Olovsson, music & SFX
Clara Nymark, graphics
Carro Viola Bodin, graphics
